io.protostuff.mojo

Class ProtoModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.protostuff.compiler.ProtoModule
      • io.protostuff.mojo.ProtoModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ProtoModule
extends ProtoModule
    Specifically for the maven-plugin. This allows you to not specify implementation="io.protostuff.protocompiler.ProtoModule" on your <protoModule> </protoModule> tags
    Author:
    David Yu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Date created:
    Jan 14, 2010
